summary: Diff adds six new playable game pages (Centipede, Missile Command, Pinball, Bubble Shooter, Q*bert, Dig Dug), adds routes for them in App.tsx, and updates Home/Leaderboard route mappings. Backend main.mo is updated to include new games and score maps, and a new backend/migration.mo is added to extend stable state with six new score maps. However, the required static preview image files under frontend/public/assets/generated are not shown as added in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add static preview images for the six new games under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact required filenames, and render them on the Home page cards via the existing gameImages mapping.
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage.tsx references the six new generated preview image paths, but the diff summary does not show any new files added under frontend/public/assets/generated (no image assets listed in Added files).
evidence: file-diff summary: ADDED FILES list (no frontend/public/assets/generated/*.png entries)
